name: Links! (conchology)
description:
Links is a color matching Tetris like game made for GMTK jam 2021, where you try to make sausage links of the same color. It's kind of like Dr. Mario with sausages! Not the most original idea but I had a lot of fun working on it.

Gameplay:

The object is to string together sausage links of the same color. Links of 4 or more are taken off the board.

In Game Controls:

"A" "D" "S"/ RIGHT, LEFT, DOWN ARROW KEYS or DPAD: MOVE SAUSAGE

"W"/ UP ARROW KEY or DPAD: ROTATE SAUSAGE

ESCAPE/ START BUTTON: PAUSE

Menu Controls:

"W"" S"/ UP, DOWN  ARROW KEYS or DPAD: NAVIGATE MENU

ENTER/ JOYPAD A:  SELECT 

ASSETS:

In addition to some (terrible) sprites I made myself, I used the following free assets : 

Fonts:

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts

https://fontbundles.net/free-fonts/regular-fonts/sausages#gtmList=5>mPos=3&aaQ...

Sound Effects:

https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

Amazing pig chef Sprite:

https://opengameart.org/content/pig-chef-48x48
